text: recessive inheritance - Bony paranasal bossing - Broad alveolar ridges - Club-shaped distal femur - Coarse facial features - Delayed eruption of permanent teeth - Facial hyperostosis - Flared metaphysis - Macrocephaly - Mandibular prognathia - Metaphyseal dysplasia - Mixed hearing impairment - Nasal obstruction - Optic atrophy - Patchy sclerosis of finger phalanx - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
